item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:59 Chances: Robinhood Markets, Inc is expanding its suite of products with the introduction of a new credit card, attracting millions of potential customers. The company’s focus on providing commission-free stock trading with no account minimums and fractional share trading has positioned it well in the retail brokerage market.
